name: PAndemiC MAN
description:
Have you noticed that grocery shopping during a pandemic is a bit like playing PAC-MAN?

You collect items as you make your way through a maze while trying to stay away from other shoppers who may sneeze or cough and unleash the virus.
Get a mask and avoid the virus to stay healthy or fight it with disinfectant.

If you make it to the last level (19), you'll have an encounter with Donald Trump (see video).

The game can be played with touch, keyboard (cursor keys to move, shift to spray, space to stop), or gamepad (arrows to move, B to spray, A to stop).

To play in full screen mode on an iPhone, you'll have to use this link to start the game and follow the instructions: https://www.mwurm.org/pman/play
